sentences.english: Different languages tend to arrange the order of adverbial clauses in different ways.
sentences.chinese: 不同的語言傾向於使用不同語序來組織狀語從句。

sentences.english: Therefore, the general principle of word order translation should not be applied mechanically to the translation of anticlimax.
sentences.chinese: 突降辭格的翻譯不能套用一般的語序翻譯原則。

sentences.english: The internal word order of designating forms follows the rule of priority of attribute-core.
sentences.chinese: 指稱形式的內部語序，遵循定中優先的原則。

sentences.english: Rewrite the inverted sentences using normal word order.
sentences.chinese: 用正常語序改寫下列倒裝句。

sentences.english: One version used only word order to convey grammatical information, and the other added signed tags.
sentences.chinese: 一個版本只使用了語序，另一個則添加了標籤語。

sentences.english: If you want to change the definition of the word order, can be described as Dry is a folly.
sentences.chinese: 你若要改變其定義中的語序，可謂是幹蠢事了。

sentences.english: This thesis discusses word order concerning cardinals and ordinals and its relevant problems.
sentences.chinese: 本文旨在討論基數詞和序數詞的語序及其相關問題。

sentences.english: Put the words in parentheses in their correct order.
sentences.chinese: 將括弧內的詞按正確的語序排好。

sentences.english: This is an objective clause. Notice the word order.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個賓語從句，注意語序。

definition: lit. view a text and interpret (idiom); to interpret word by word without understanding the meaning/a far-fetched interpretation
to speak without thinking (idiom)/to blurt sth out
Chinese back-sloping comma 、 (punct. used to separate items in a list)
study of classic texts, including interpretation, glossaries and commentaries
to notate music/to write a score
variant of 流水賬|流水账[liu2 shui3 zhang4]
